00038 // Data type: QString
00039 // Default: QString()
00040 enum KviKvsParameterTypeQString
00041 {
00042         KVS_PT_STRING = 0,
00043         KVS_PT_NONEMPTYSTRING = 1
00044 };
00045 
00046 // Data type: kvs_int_t
00047 // Default: 0
00048 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKvsIntT
00049 {
00050         KVS_PT_INT = 2,
00051         KVS_PT_INTEGER = 2
00052 };
00053 
00054 // Data type: kvs_uint_t
00055 // Default: 0
00056 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKvsUIntT
00057 {
00058         KVS_PT_UINT = 3,
00059         KVS_PT_UNSIGNEDINTEGER = 3
00060 };
00061 
00062 // Data type: kvs_real_t
00063 // default: 0.0
00064 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKvsRealT
00065 {
00066         KVS_PT_DOUBLE = 4,
00067         KVS_PT_REAL = 4
00068 };
00069 
00070 // Data type: bool
00071 // default: false
00072 enum KviKvsParameterTypeBool
00073 {
00074         KVS_PT_BOOL = 5,
00075         KVS_PT_BOOLEAN = 5
00076 };
00077 
00078 // Data type: KviKvsHash *
00079 // default: 0
00080 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsHashPointer
00081 {
00082         KVS_PT_HASH = 6
00083 };
00084 
00085 // Data type: KviKvsArrayCast
00086 // default empty cast
00087 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsArrayCast
00088 {
00089         KVS_PT_ARRAYCAST = 7
00090 };
00091 
00092 // Data type: KviKvsVariant *
00093 // default: 0
00094 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsVariantPointer
00095 {
00096         KVS_PT_VARIANT = 8
00097 };
00098 
00099 // Data type: QByteArray
00100 // default null string (0)
00101 enum KviKvsParameterTypeQByteArray
00102 {
00103         KVS_PT_CSTRING = 9,
00104         KVS_PT_NONEMPTYCSTRING = 10
00105 };
00106 
00107 // Data type: QStringList
00108 // default: list cleared
00109 // This eats all the remaining params in the list!
00110 enum KviKvsParameterTypeQStringList
00111 {
00112         KVS_PT_STRINGLIST = 11
00113 };
00114 
00115 // Data type: KviKvsVariantList
00116 // default: list cleared
00117 // This eats all the remaining params in the list!
00118 // The list has autodelete set to off since the copies are SHALLOW (as opposed to deep)!
00119 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsVariantList
00120 {
00121         KVS_PT_VARIANTLIST = 12
00122 };
00123 
00124 // Data type: kvs_hobject_t
00125 // default: (kvs_hobject_t)0
00126 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKvsHObjectT
00127 {
00128         KVS_PT_HOBJECT = 13
00129 };
00130 
00131 // Data type: KviKvsArray *
00132 // default 0
00133 enum KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsArrayPointer
00134 {
00135         KVS_PT_ARRAY = 14
00136 };
00137 
00138 // Data type: ignored
00139 #define KVS_PT_IGNORE 15
00140 
00141 // If omitted, set to default
00142 #define KVS_PF_OPTIONAL 1
00143 // Valid only for string types: it's the last parameter that eats all the remaining ones
00144 #define KVS_PF_APPENDREMAINING 2

00150 namespace KviKvsParameterProcessor
00151 {
00152         class KVIRC_API ParameterFormat
00153         {
00154         public:
00155                 const char          * szName;
00156                 unsigned char         uType;
00157                 unsigned char         uFlags;
00158                 void                * pContainer;
00159         public:
00160                 // KVS_PT_STRING, KVS_PT_NONEMPTYSTRING
00161                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeQString type,unsigned char flags,QString &szBuffer)
00162                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&szBuffer)) {};
00163 
00164                 // KVS_PT_INTEGER (KVS_PT_INT)
00165                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKvsIntT type,unsigned char flags,kvs_int_t &iBuffer)
00166                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&iBuffer)) {};
00167 
00168                 // KVS_PT_UNSIGNEDINTEGER (KVS_PT_UINT)
00169                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKvsUIntT type,unsigned char flags,kvs_uint_t &uBuffer)
00170                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&uBuffer)) {};
00171 
00172                 // KVS_PT_DOUBLE (KVS_PT_REAL)
00173                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKvsRealT type,unsigned char flags,kvs_real_t &dBuffer)
00174                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&dBuffer)) {};
00175 
00176                 // KVS_PT_BOOL (KVS_PT_BOOLEAN)
00177                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeBool type,unsigned char flags,bool &bBuffer)
00178                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&bBuffer)) {};
00179 
00180                 // KVS_PT_HASH
00181                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsHashPointer type,unsigned char flags,KviKvsHash * &pBuffer)
00182                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&pBuffer)) {};
00183 
00184                 // KVS_PT_ARRAYCAST
00185                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsArrayCast type,unsigned char flags,KviKvsArrayCast &oBuffer)
00186                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&oBuffer)) {};
00187 
00188                 // KVS_PT_VARIANT
00189                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsVariantPointer type,unsigned char flags,KviKvsVariant * &pBuffer)
00190                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&pBuffer)) {};
00191 
00192                 // KVS_PT_CSTRING, KVS_PT_NONEMPTYCSTRING
00193                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeQByteArray type,unsigned char flags,QByteArray &szBuffer)
00194                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&szBuffer)) {};
00195 
00196                 // KVS_PT_STRINGLIST
00197                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeQStringList type,unsigned char flags,QStringList &lBuffer)
00198                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&lBuffer)) {};
00199 
00200                 // KVS_PT_VARIANTLIST
00201                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsVariantList type,unsigned char flags,KviKvsVariantList &lBuffer)
00202                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&lBuffer)) {};
00203 
00204                 // KVS_PT_HOBJECT
00205                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKvsHObjectT type,unsigned char flags,kvs_hobject_t &hBuffer)
00206                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&hBuffer)) {};
00207 
00208                 // KVS_PT_ARRAY
00209                 ParameterFormat(const char * name,KviKvsParameterTypeKviKvsArrayPointer type,unsigned char flags,KviKvsArray * &pBuffer)
00210                         : szName(name), uType((unsigned char)type), uFlags(flags), pContainer((void *)(&pBuffer)) {};
00211 
00212                 // KVS_PT_IGNORE
00213                 ParameterFormat(const char * name)
00214                         : szName(name), uType(KVS_PT_IGNORE), uFlags(0), pContainer(NULL) {}
00215 
00216                 // terminator
00217                 ParameterFormat()
00218                         : szName(NULL), uType(KVS_PT_IGNORE), uFlags(0), pContainer(NULL) {};
00219 
00220                 //ParameterFormat(const char * n,unsigned char t,unsigned char f,void * p)
00221                 //: szName(n), uType(t), uFlags(f), pContainer(p) {};
00222         };
00223 
00224         KVIRC_API bool process(KviKvsVariantList * pVariantList,KviKvsRunTimeContext * pContext,KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat * pFmtArray);
00225 }

00228 #define KVS_PARAMETERS_BEGIN(__name) \
00229                 KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat __name[] = \
00230                 {
00231 
00232 #define KVS_PARAMETERS_END \
00233                         KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat(0) \
00234                 };

00240                         KviKvsParameterProcessor::ParameterFormat(__name,__type,__flags,__param),
